S0001: I want to speak Mandarin Chinese with you now.
S0003: how to speak as often as possible.
S0004: how to say something in Mandarin Chinese
怎么用中文说一些东西
S0005: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.
S0006: I'm trying to remember a word.
S0007: I want to try as hard as I can today.
S0008: I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
我要试着解释我的意思。
S0009: I speak a little Mandarin Chinese now.
S0010: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
我不确定我能不能记住整个句子。
S0011: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
我想能够在你说完之后说话。
S0012: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
我不想猜明天会发生什么。
S0013: You speak Mandarin Chinese very well.
S0014: Do you speak Mandarin Chinese all day?
S0015: And I want you to speak Mandarin Chinese with me tomorrow.
而且我想要你明天和我说中文。
S0016: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
他想晚点和其他人一起回来。
S0017: She wants to find out what the answer is.
S0018: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
我们想今天晚上六点见面。
S0019: But I don't want to stop talking.
S0020: You want to learn his name quickly.
你想快点学会他的名字。
S0021: Why are you learning her name?
你为什么在学她的名字？
S0022: Because I want to meet people who speak Mandarin Chinese.
因为我想认识会说中文的人。
S0023: I'm going to start talking more soon.
我很快就要开始多说话了。
S0024: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
我不会很容易就能记住。
S0025: Are you going to help me before I have to go?
在我必须走之前你会帮我吗？
S0026: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
我喜欢感觉好像我快准备好走了。
S0027: I don't like taking too much time to answer.
我不喜欢花太多时间回答。
S0028: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
尽快开始说话是有用的。
S0029: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
我期待尽快能说得更好。
S0030: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
我昨天想问你一些事情。
S0031: You wanted to speak with me tonight.
S0032: Did you want to show me something?
你想给我看一些东西吗？
S0033: How long have you been learning Mandarin Chinese?
S0034: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.
当其他人在这里的时候他不想安静。
S0035: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.
她今天下午不想读任何东西。
S0036: We don't want to interrupt the story.
我们不想打断这个故事。
S0037: I started to think about it carefully last month.
我上个月开始仔细地考虑这件事。
S0038: I've been learning for about a week.
我已经学了大约一个星期了。
S0039: But I'm a little tired this morning.
S0040: How do you feel at the moment?
S0041: I feel okay, but I'm starting to feel tired.
我感觉还好，但我开始觉得累了。
S0042: I was starting to feel better than last night.
我开始觉得比昨晚好了。
S0043: I wasn't thinking about how to answer.
S0044: Or if I need to improve.
S0045: I don't need to know everything.
我不需要知道所有事情。
S0046: But I don't worry about making mistakes.
S0047: Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.
因为我认为犯错是件好事。
S0048: I don't care about making mistakes.
S0049: It's like this, if you know what I mean.
就是这样，如果你知道我的意思的话。
S0050: I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.
我不是在试着尽快完成。
S0051: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
S0052: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.
他上周想给他的朋友写封信。
S0053: She wanted to put his letter in her bag.
她想把他的信放进她的包里。
S0054: We wanted to give you a little more time.
我们想多给你一点时间。
S0055: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.
当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
S0056: So I can remember how to say a few words.
这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
S0057: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.
我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
S0058: It's interesting when you understand enough words.
当你理解足够多的词的时候很有趣。
S0059: I know how to do what I need to do next week.
我知道下周我需要做什么。
S0060: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.
我还不知道怎么说足够多不同的词。
S0061: Could you say that again a little more slowly?
你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
S0062: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.
我不确定我能不能同时帮你。
S0063: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?
你确定你不介意帮我吗？
S0064: Learning Mandarin Chinese isn't easy but it is fun.
学中文不容易，但很有趣。
S0065: It's important to take time to test yourself.
花时间测试自己很重要。
S0066: It's not difficult to find the answer.
S0067: Why do you want to stop?
S0069: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.
他不想整个下午都照顾那只小狗。
S0070: She didn't want to tell me where it was.
她不想告诉我它在哪里。
